showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // “You mean that member of SOLDIER
who came with Sephiroth
wasn't…{Cloud}?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // {Tifa}
“Don't hurry, {Cloud}…
Don't answer too quickly.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // {Tifa}
“Just keep checking all those small emotions
and it'll come back…
Slowly…little by little…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // {Tifa}
“Right…like the sky that night…
the heavens were filled with stars…”

dialogStrings:
{Tifa}
“Take your time, {Cloud}.
Slowly…little by little, OK?”

“You mean that member of SOLDIER
who came with Sephiroth
wasn't…{Cloud}?”

“That starry night at the well…
and our promises…What if
the memory was all just a lie?”

{Tifa}
“Just keep checking all those small emotions
and it'll come back…
Slowly…little by little…”

{Tifa}
“Right…like the sky that night…
the heavens were filled with stars…”

“…A sealed up
secret…wish…”{PAUSE}“Tender feelings…
that no one can ever know…”
